articles.description: Owen Farrell will miss the first two pool games at the World Cup as World Rugby successfully appeals against the decision to overturn his red card.
articles.title: Farrell banned for first two World Cup pool games

articles.description: Rangers host PSV Eindhoven in the first leg of their Champions League play-off. Follow radio and text coverage.
articles.title: Champions League: Rangers host PSV in play-off first leg

articles.description: Follow live coverage as Britain's Laura Muir goes up against Faith Kipyegon and Sifan Hassan in the women's 1500m final.
articles.title: Watch: World Championships - Muir v Kipyegon & Hassan in 1500m final

articles.description: Britain's Laura Muir finishes sixth at the World Championships in Budapest as Faith Kipyegon wins her third title.
articles.title: Muir sixth in 1500m as Kipyegon dominates

articles.description: Phil Foden could be set for his biggest season yet, with the forward showing he can make the number 10 position his own at Manchester City.
articles.title: 'Wasted on wing' - Foden set for 'big season'

articles.description: England batter Harry Brook hits a sensational 105 not out for Northern Superchargers against Welsh Fire in The Hundred.
articles.title: Brook blasts magnificent century for Superchargers

articles.description: Liverpool midfielder Alexis Mac Allister's red card in Saturday's 3-1 Premier League win over Bournemouth has been overturned following a successful appeal.
articles.title: Mac Allister red card overturned after appeal

articles.description: Watch as Great Britain's Matthew Hudson-Smith breaks the British and European records with a with time of 44.26 seconds to win his semi-final at the at the World Athletics Championships.
articles.title: Hudson-Smith sets European record on way to 400m final

articles.description: Mason Greenwood moving from Manchester United to a Saudi Arabian club would be "very surprising", a senior league source has told BBC Sport.
articles.title: Greenwood move to Saudi would be 'very surprising'

articles.description: Unified heavyweight world champion Oleksandr Usyk's promoter says "it's our obligation" to deliver an undisputed fight against Tyson Fury.
articles.title: 'Usyk has obligation to face Fury in undisputed bout'
